<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Symbols normally have NumberOfAuxSymbols set correctly all the time.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For file symbols, we need to know the output file&#39;s symbol size to be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!S.AuxFile.empty())</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SizeOfHeaders = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="normal">  FileAlignment = 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PeHeaderSize = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Obj.IsPE) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal">    Obj.DosHeader.AddressOfNewExeHeader =</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="normal">    SizeOfHeaders +=</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the PE header had a checksum, clear it, since it isn&#39;t valid</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SymTabSize == 0 &amp;&amp; StrTabSize &lt;= 4 &amp;&amp; Obj.IsPE) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><Highlight kind="normal">    PointerToSymbolTable = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><Highlight kind="normal">    StrTabSize = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumRawSymbols = SymTabSize / SymbolSize;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><Highlight kind="normal">  Obj.CoffFileHeader.PointerToSymbolTable = PointerToSymbolTable;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><Highlight kind="normal">  Obj.CoffFileHeader.NumberOfSymbols = NumRawSymbols;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><Highlight kind="normal">  FileSize += SymTabSize + StrTabSize;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><Highlight kind="normal">  FileSize = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(FileSize, FileAlignment);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
